sports.name: Football
sports.description: Football is more than just a game, it's a symphony of passion, teamwork, and skill that resonates in the hearts of fans around the world.

sports.name: Cricket
sports.description: Cricket is a game that owes much of its unique appeal to the fact that it should be played not only within its Laws but also within the Spirit of the Game.

sports.name: Volleyball
sports.description: In volleyball, it's not about the level of skill, but the level of heart and effort you put into the game. It's a passion that unites us.

sports.name: Table Tennis
sports.description: In table tennis, one does not win through luck or chance, it's a matter of precision, strategy, and persistence.

sports.name: Foosball
sports.description: The key to foosball success? Keeping your opponents on their toes and your foosmen on their feet. A game where friendships are built and rivalries are born.

sports.name: Badminton
sports.description: Badminton is like ballet dancing. It requires a lot of control, strength, and flexibility. It's not about being the best, it's about being better everyday.

sports.name: Chess
sports.description: Chess is a war over the board. The object is to crush the opponent's mind. A game of skill, strategy, and patience, blending art and science into a passion.

sports.name: Carrom
sports.description: A carrom board is a mirror that reflects a player's focus, determination, and resilience, teaching us that success is a collection of well-placed shots.

sports.name: Snooker
sports.description: Snooker is a game of simple shots played to perfection, while pool is a game of complex shots played as simply as possible.
